name: OTHERVIEW (AtomHack)
description:
Otherview is a reality bending puzzle game that takes the player on a 3D and 2D adventure simultaneously.

The game is designed to alter the player's approach to solving basic platforming puzzles by distorting 3D space depending on the camera's perspective.

The goal is to reach a wormhole to finish each level. To do so, players will forge their own path by finding the right perspective to tackle every challenge.

   Current version:

  • Different mind-blowing concepts in one unique experience.
  • Multiple handmade levels with different scales (Toy Story style).
  • Portal 2 style gameplay.

   Upcoming:

  • Gravity changes.
  • Interaction with mirror dimension.
  • Level Editor to create custom puzzles.

We've just released the Beta Version of the game. This is not a finished product and as such could have a few bugs. We are working really hard to release the game!

Please download it and give us some feedback!
